channel.title: Price checker & gravestones & some other stuff
channel.description:
[b]Price checker:[/b] [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/22676414/updates/capture-12.gif[/img]
[b]Gravestones:[/b]
[i][u]Video:[/u][/i] [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/10hreiq/5]Click on this for the video[/URL]
[b][i]Pictures:[/i][/b] [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/22676414/grave.png[/img]
Ignore the close button, it's fixed ;) [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/22676414/grave2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/22676414/grave341.png[/img] [b] Price checker:[/b]
[i]Supports adding/removing 1,2,5,10,x,all Once close your items will appear in inventory and it deletes all frames. Supports stackables Prices based from prices.txt[/i]
[b]Gravestones[/b]
[i]Correct timers (rswiki) Once timer = 0 items appear for others Reading a gravestone You can only demolish a gravestones once it's yours. Gravestones demolishes when timer is 0. You can set your gravestone Gravestone saves[/i]
[b]Bounty Hunter:[/b]
[i]All 3 craters working You wont assign a target on the other crater (low,med,high) You can 'pj' your target You can 'pj' hunted by Once you kill a target you wont have pickup penalty Once you kill somebody not your target you will have a pickup penalty Picking up items will turn into can't leave Protect item(s) will be automatically turned off (on pickup penalty as well) (also for curses) You cannot activate protect item prayers when pickup/cant leave penalty You have to wait 2 minutes before you can enter on death You have to wait 30 seconds before you can enter on leaving Correct skulls calculating on inventory and equipment[/i]
[IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/22676414/picture.png[/img] [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/22676414/sa.png[/img] [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/22676414/stuff/pic2.png[/img] [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/22676414/stuff/pic3.png[/img] [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/22676414/stuff/done/pic5.png[/img] [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/22676414/stuff/done/pic4.png[/img]

item.title: Price checker & gravestones & some other stuff
item.dc:creator: @iQuality iQuality
item.description:
@iQuality wrote:

Davidi2:

That was sarcasm in relation to you putting the ‘it will survive X minutes’ part on the gravestone itself. That part should just be a chat message

Oh yes I already updated that, lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Price checker & gravestones & some other stuff
item.dc:creator: @iQuality iQuality
item.description:
@iQuality wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:20, topic:434199”][quote author=iQuality link=topic=536915.msg3928152#msg3928152 date=1330417601]

Do you think your price checker is perfect?

Don’t see much work on it yet, besides some re positioning perhaps…

Does this support scrolling?

This isn’t even difficult what’s so special about it?

its hard men u gota update the item through some arrays or use sendframerandomidhere and delete the item from the player when offering.

It’s pretty basic imo.

I did not add support for scrolling, as I ripped the data from RSWiki: Before trade limit price checker was able to scroll. Now it does not.
[/quote]
Damn… long time since I’ve used one of those…[/quote]

That’s were I get all my data from ;p

Read full topic
item.source: Price checker & gravestones & some other stuff
